facility.name: Control Room
entries: A control room is where the rusting bulk of a roving junkpile can be directed towards its next destination.

entries.name: Operate: Drive
entries: When you issue the Operate order to this facility, you provide the facility's hireling with a heading and distance to your desired location. The hireling will then attempt to convey you to that location in a timely manner.
This order may take multiple Bastion turns to complete.

facility.name: Viewing Port
entries: The view would be spectacular, were it not for the grime coating the glass.
